metadata.dc:author: Acosta Gío, A E
metadata.dc:description: If left untreated, pemphigus is usually fatal. Therefore, it is important that therapy be started early in the course of the disease. In most cases, the oral mucosa is the first site of involvement. Hence, responsibility for early diagnosis often falls on the dental surgeon.
metadata.dc:title: Pénfigo vulgar en la clínica estomatológica.
[Pemphigus vulgaris in the dental clinic].
